catentdesc.name: Albini Fashionable Black Leather Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black leather bag with two shoulder straps
catentdesc.longdescription: This fashionable leather shoulder bag is large enough to do second duty as your tote bag. It has double leather straps embellished with metal hoops going across the body of the bag and a metal snap to adjust the length of the strap.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Classic White Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: White bag with silver metal studs
catentdesc.longdescription: A puffy white bag made of soft leather, this bag has short rounded straps for comfy grip and a zipper in the front for your cell phone and keys. The silver metal studs at the sides show off a modern, stylish look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Leopard Bag
catentdesc.longdescription: A shoulder bag in leopard print with short shiny black straps, this bag exemplifies the latest in vogue. This bag also has a longer strap for cross-body wear. A small brass lock secures the zip closure.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Black Leather Tote Bag
catentdesc.longdescription: A simple and chic black leather tote bag, this bag has a straight, sharp look, following a modern design. The stitching at the center gives a finished look to the bag with enough space to hold the basic things every woman requires.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Red Shiny Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: Red shiny bag with metal buckles
catentdesc.longdescription: A strappy bag with metal hoops and buckles, the color variation lends depth and character to this red bag. The multiple seams crisscrossing across the bag and the showy strap with the metal ornament creates a stylish and fashionable look. Of soft leather make, this bag brings shimmer to your wardrobe.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Beige Tote Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: Beige tote bag with contrast-colored straps
catentdesc.longdescription: This square-shaped beige tote bag is color-coordinated with contrast brown straps and beading around the bag. For a fancier look, the ends of the straps, adorned with metal clasps, are fastened to black and white patterned leather patches.

catentdesc.name: Albini Hawaiian Satchel Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: Hawaiian satchel bag in turquoise blue
catentdesc.longdescription: This satchel bag in turquoise blue with flower motifs portrays a Hawaiian look and feel and is perfect for the beach on a bright sunny day. Adjust the shoulder straps to any length for convenient handling.

catentdesc.name: Versatil White Satchel Leather Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: White satchel leather bag with long tassels
catentdesc.longdescription: This white satchel leather bag with thin straps, has a broad covering flap concealing the different pockets on the bag and is patterned in white checks. The bag is further adorned with long leather tassels attached to golden rings for a flamboyant look.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Flowery Leather Bag
catentdesc.longdescription: With a big, brown flower fastened to the center of the bag, this bag exudes vintage elegance. With a square slim frame and long shoulder straps, this bag is suitable for all excursions whether you take it to office for that extra designer element to your outfit or sling it across your shoulders on your regular shopping day.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Cloth Satchel Bag
catentdesc.shortdescription: Chocolate brown woven cloth satchel bag
catentdesc.longdescription: This satchel bag displays a woven look with interlacing strands of brown and white threads. With an overlay of securely fastened leather straps in chocolate brown, this bag provides a refined and professional appearance.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Red Crocodile Handbag
catentdesc.longdescription: This red crocodile handbag is stylish and luxurious with tubular top handles and a zip closure. The compact size makes it suitable for any outing. This designer handbag with croc pattern is made of the best quality leather.

catentdesc.name: Luigi Valenti Dual-Toned Bag
catentdesc.longdescription: This dual-toned bag is a combination of light and dark browns with a black dotted closing flap. The bag is made of soft leather and has a short leather handle fastened to metal rims. Match the bag with a dark-colored dress for a refined appearance.

catentdesc.name: Albini Black Sequined Clutch Purse
catentdesc.shortdescription: Black shiny and sequined clutch purse
catentdesc.longdescription: This black clutch is sequined and shiny to denote ultimate luxury and indulgence. Desirable for a cocktail evening, this purse sports a titanium clasp and beading. With a drop-in chain strap and a satin lining inside, you are sure to be flooded with compliments.

catentdesc.name: Versatil Embroidered Clutch Purse
catentdesc.shortdescription: Brown embroidered clutch purse with beaded handle
catentdesc.longdescription: Attached to a beautiful handle with gold beadwork, this brown clutch is embroidered with sequins and motifs in a floral design. The warm earthy hue will match with all your outfits. Carry it for a special occasion and be noticed.

catentdesc.name: Hermitage Red Sequined Clutch Purse
catentdesc.shortdescription: Red sequined butterfly clutch purse with chain handle
catentdesc.longdescription: An iridescent butterfly of bright-colored plastic beads on a bed of blazing red sequins, this clutch is vibrant and flashy. Joined by a silver chain handle and clasp, this clutch can turn into the talk of the town.

catentdesc.name: Gusso Silver Sequined Clutch Purse
catentdesc.shortdescription: Silver shiny and sequined clutch purse
catentdesc.longdescription: This silver clutch is compact for you to carry with your favorite evening dress. Silver sequins are threaded together to form the glitzy and glamorous pouch. The clutch looks showy and sophisticated and comes with a silver clasp and beading.

catentdesc.name: Borsati Sparkling Silver Box Clutch
catentdesc.shortdescription: Sparkling silver box clutch with dual handles
catentdesc.longdescription: This sparkling silver box clutch comes with two handles a short titanium handle and a long silver chain. Monocromatic and pale hued, this jazzy purse has a hardshell cover. It is a must have in your evening wardrobe.
